channel.title: Lifelong Learning on MisakaJimmy Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lifelong Learning on MisakaJimmy Blog

item.description: install docker-compose v2 官方 github 1wget https://github.com/docker/compose-cli/releases/download/v2.0.0-beta.6/docker-compose-linux-amd64 2sudo chmod a+x ./docker-compose-linux-amd64 3mkdir ~/.docker/cli-plugins 4sudo mv ./docker-compose-linux-amd64 ~/.docker/cli-plugins/docker-compose
